snippet.title: Splendor Blast II Arcade
snippet.description:
This game is pretty much as you'd expect from a futuristic racing game: 
Spaceships instead of cars, racers risking life and limb, interfering space monsters and a little bit of shooting, as well as that old chestnut and lots of opponents on screen. 
The fuel gauge that serves as a combined health bar and time limit is the only way to end game,otherwise it loops indefinitely.
You race through the stages at very high-speed, dodging obstacles and overtaking 40 opponents. 
The latter half of each stage will also let you shoot to destroy obstacles and aliens, though not your opponents, who will manage to avoid getting hit every time (though you can use this to your advantage by getting them out of the way). 
There is also gates then you need to cross to receive buffs,sometimes is a barrier, sometime is turbo parts for your ship or a side nozzle to help you push over your rivals.
At the end of each stage, you get a bonus based on which position you finished in, how quick you were (as long as you finished in under a minute) and just a bonus for finishing. 
You also get some of your fuel back, at a rate which seems to be directly tied to how large your bonuses were.

There are 7 course in total, every course is a travel between different planets,this game is single player only.

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/InsertCoinArcadeOfficial/
Email: insertcoinarcade@outlook.it
Twitter: https://twitter.com/InsertCoinArcad
